events: Mark Hamill was born, beginning a journey that would lead him to become a versatile actor and cultural icon.
Hamill was cast as Luke Skywalker in Star Wars, narrowly avoiding being cut from the film after a serious car accident that fractured his nose and cheekbone.
Hamill won Saturn Awards for Best Actor for his performances in The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi.
To avoid being typecast, Hamill diversified his career by performing in Broadway plays and exploring voice acting.
Became renowned for voice acting, most notably as the Joker in Batman animated series and films.
Returned to Star Wars sequel trilogy, reprising his iconic role of Luke Skywalker and receiving critical acclaim.
knowledge: Extensive knowledge of Star Wars franchise and his character Luke Skywalker
